summary.span: 表示 XML 文件。

summary.span: 如需 物件的元件和用法，請參閱 XDocument 類別概觀。

span.span: For the components and usage of an object, see XDocument Class Overview.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊的有效的內容，請參閱 < [ 有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content of an , see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). ## Examples 下列範例建立文件，並再將註解和項目加入至它。The following example creates a document, and then adds a comment and an element to it. 它接著會使用的查詢結果的另一個文件來撰寫。It then composes another document using the results of a query. ```csharp XDocument srcTree = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment"), new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", "data1"), new XElement("Child2", "data2"), new XElement("Child3", "data3"), new XElement("Child2", "data4"), new XElement("Info5", "info5"), new XElement("Info6", "info6"), new XElement("Info7", "info7"), new XElement("Info8", "info8") ) ); XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment"), new XElement("Root", from el in srcTree.Element("Root").Elements() where ((string)el).StartsWith("data") select el ) ); Console.WriteLine(doc); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XDocument = _ data1 data2 data3 data4 info5 info6 info7 info8 Dim doc As XDocument = _ <%= From el In srcTree..Elements _ Where CStr(el).StartsWith("data") _ Select el %> Console.WriteLine(doc) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml data1 data2 data3 data4 ```

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多載的建構函式可讓您建立新的空;，即可建立某些指定的初始內容; 以及建立做為另一個複本物件。Overloaded constructors enable you to create a new empty ; to create an with some specified initial content; and to create an as a copy of another object. 需要您建立 的案例並不多。There are not many scenarios that require you to create an . 不過，您通常可以使用 根節點來建立 XML 樹狀結構。Instead, you can usually create your XML trees with an root node. 除非您有建立文件的特定需求 (例如，因為您必須在頂層建立處理指示與註解，或者您必須支援文件型別)，否則使用 做為您的根節點通常更方便。Unless you have a specific requirement to create a document (for example, because you have to create processing instructions and comments at the top level, or you have to support document types), it is often more convenient to use as your root node. 如需詳細資訊的有效的內容，請參閱 < [ 有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content of an , see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). ## Examples 下列範例建立文件，並再將註解和項目加入至它。The following example creates a document, and then adds a comment and an element to it. 它接著會使用的查詢結果的另一個文件來撰寫。It then composes another document using the results of a query. ```csharp XDocument srcTree = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment"), new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", "data1"), new XElement("Child2", "data2"), new XElement("Child3", "data3"), new XElement("Child2", "data4"), new XElement("Info5", "info5"), new XElement("Info6", "info6"), new XElement("Info7", "info7"), new XElement("Info8", "info8") ) ); XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment"), new XElement("Root", from el in srcTree.Element("Root").Elements() where ((string)el).StartsWith("data") select el ) ); Console.WriteLine(doc); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XDocument = _ data1 data2 data3 data4 info5 info6 info7 info8 Dim doc As XDocument = _ <%= From el In srcTree..Elements _ Where CStr(el).StartsWith("data") _ Select el %> Console.WriteLine(doc) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml data1 data2 data3 data4 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 需要您建立 的案例並不多。There are not many scenarios that require you to create an . 不過，您通常可以使用 根節點來建立 XML 樹狀結構。Instead, you can usually create your XML trees with an root node. 除非您有建立文件的特定需求 (例如，因為您必須在頂層建立處理指示與註解，或者您必須支援文件型別)，否則使用 做為您的根節點通常更方便。Unless you have a specific requirement to create a document (for example, because you have to create processing instructions and comments at the top level, or you have to support document types), it is often more convenient to use as your root node. 如需詳細資訊的有效的內容，請參閱 < [ 有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content of an , see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). ## Examples 下列範例會建立新的文件，然後將加入其中的 註解和項目。The following example creates a new document, and then adds a comment and an element to it. ```csharp XDocument doc = new XDocument(); doc.Add(new XComment("This is a comment")); doc.Add(new XElement("Root", "content")); Console.WriteLine(doc); ``` ```vb Dim doc As XDocument = New XDocument() doc.Add() doc.Add(content) Console.WriteLine(doc) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml content ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 需要您建立 的案例並不多。There are not many scenarios that require you to create an . 不過，您通常可以使用 根節點來建立 XML 樹狀結構。Instead, you can usually create your XML trees with an root node. 除非您有建立文件的特定需求 (例如，因為您必須在頂層建立處理指示與註解，或者您必須支援文件型別)，否則使用 做為您的根節點通常更方便。Unless you have a specific requirement to create a document (for example, because you have to create processing instructions and comments at the top level, or you have to support document types), it is often more convenient to use as your root node. 如需詳細資訊的有效的內容，請參閱 < [ 有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content of an , see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). ## Examples 下列範例建立文件，並再將註解和項目加入至它。The following example creates a document, and then adds a comment and an element to it. 它接著會使用的查詢結果的另一個文件來撰寫。It then composes another document using the results of a query. ```csharp XDocument srcTree = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment"), new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", "data1"), new XElement("Child2", "data2"), new XElement("Child3", "data3"), new XElement("Child2", "data4"), new XElement("Info5", "info5"), new XElement("Info6", "info6"), new XElement("Info7", "info7"), new XElement("Info8", "info8") ) ); XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment"), new XElement("Root", from el in srcTree.Element("Root").Elements() where ((string)el).StartsWith("data") select el ) ); Console.WriteLine(doc); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XDocument = _ data1 data2 data3 data4 info5 info6 info7 info8 Dim doc As XDocument = _ <%= From el In srcTree..Elements _ Where CStr(el).StartsWith("data") _ Select el %> Console.WriteLine(doc) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml data1 data2 data3 data4 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 需要您建立 的案例並不多。There are not many scenarios that require you to create an . 不過，您通常可以使用 根節點來建立 XML 樹狀結構。Instead, you can usually create your XML trees with an root node. 除非您有建立文件的特定需求 (例如，因為您必須在頂層建立處理指示與註解，或者您必須支援文件型別)，否則使用 做為您的根節點通常更方便。Unless you have a specific requirement to create a document (for example, because you have to create processing instructions and comments at the top level, or you have to support document types), it is often more convenient to use as your root node. 如需詳細資訊的有效的內容，請參閱 < [ 有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content of an , see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). ## Examples 下列範例會使用這個建構函式建立的文件。The following example uses this constructor to create a document. ```csharp XDocument srcTree = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment"), new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", "data1"), new XElement("Child2", "data2"), new XElement("Child3", "data3"), new XElement("Child2", "data4"), new XElement("Info5", "info5"), new XElement("Info6", "info6"), new XElement("Info7", "info7"), new XElement("Info8", "info8") ) ); XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "yes"), new XComment("This is a new comment"), new XElement("Root", from el in srcTree.Element("Root").Elements() where ((string)el).StartsWith("data") select el ) ); doc.Save("Test.xml"); Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("Test.xml")); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XDocument = _ data1 data2 data3 data4 info5 info6 info7 info8 Dim doc As XDocument = _ <%= From el In srcTree..Elements _ Where CStr(el).StartsWith("data") _ Select el %> doc.Save("Test.xml") Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("Test.xml")) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml data1 data2 data3 data4 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有時候，您必須建立文件的 XML 宣告。Sometimes you have to create an XML declaration for a document. 如果您想要指出文件是獨立，您必須使用這個屬性。If you want to indicate that a document is standalone, you must use this property. 如果您想要使用的編碼方式，而非 utf-8 編碼文件，您可以指定的編碼方式，透過。If you want to encode your document with an encoding other than utf-8, you can specify an encoding through the . 編碼文件的另一種方法是指定的編碼方式在，您將傳遞至 LINQ to XML 進行寫入。Another approach for encoding a document is to specify the encoding on an that you pass to LINQ to XML for writing. ## Examples 下列範例會使用這個屬性來擷取文件的 XML 宣告。The following example uses this property to retrieve the XML declaration of a document. ```csharp XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "yes"), new XComment("This is a comment"), new XElement("Root", "content") ); Console.WriteLine(doc.Declaration); ``` ```vb Dim doc As XDocument = _ content Console.WriteLine(doc.Declaration) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` ```

summary.span: 取得這個文件的文件類型定義 (DTD)。

span.span: Gets the Document Type Definition (DTD) for this document.
A that contains the DTD for this document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] 提供 Dtd 有限的的支援。 provides limited support for DTDs. 您可以填入 XML 樹狀結構以包含 DTD 的 XML 文件。You can populate an XML tree with an XML document that contains a DTD. XML 樹狀結構就會包含節點。The XML tree will then contain a node. 當您序列化或儲存樹狀目錄時，將會序列化 DTD。When you serialize or save the tree, the DTD will also be serialized. [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] 將擴充在 DTD 中的任何實體。 will expand any entities in the DTD. 當您序列化或儲存 XML 樹狀結構時，不會儲存實體的參考;相反地，節點會儲存實體參考之實體的文字所取代。When you serialize or save the XML tree, the entity references are not saved; instead, the nodes are saved with the entity references replaced by the text of the entity. 如果 DTD 包含預設屬性，屬性會建立 XML 樹狀結構中，為一般屬性。If the DTD contains default attributes, the attributes are created in the XML tree as ordinary attributes. 根據預設，[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]不會驗證其 DTD 為基礎的文件。By default, [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] does not validate a document based on its DTD. 若要驗證基礎 DTD 的文件，建立，將會驗證根據 DTD，，然後再建立 XML 樹狀結構從。To validate a document based on a DTD, create an that will validate based on a DTD, and then create an XML tree from the . ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含的文件。The following example creates a document that contains an . Visual Basic 不支援 XML 常值內的文件類型。Visual Basic does not support document types within XML literals. 不過，就可以建立第一次建立文件使用 XML 常值，並接著建立並加入含有文件類型的文件XML 樹狀結構中的適當位置中的節點。However, it is possible to create a document that contains a document type by first creating the document using XML literals, and then creating and adding an node in the appropriate place in the XML tree. ```csharp string internalSubset = @" "; string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href='mystyle.css' title='Compact' type='text/css'"; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment."), new XProcessingInstruction(target, data), new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, null, internalSubset), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); Console.WriteLine(doc); doc.Save("test.xml"); ``` ```vb Dim internalSubset = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc.Nodes().Skip(1).First().AddAfterSelf(New XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, Nothing, internalSubset)) Console.WriteLine(doc) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml ]> Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要控制載入選項，使用多載，做為參數。If you want to control load options, use the overload that takes as a parameter. LINQ to XML 的載入功能會根據。The loading functionality of LINQ to XML is built upon . 因此，您可能會攔截所擲回任何例外狀況多載的方法和方法來讀取和剖析文件。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. 如果您需要修改，請遵循下列步驟：If you have to modify , follow these steps: 1. 建立藉由呼叫其中一個多載會採用做為參數。Create an by calling one of the overloads that take as a parameter. 2. 傳遞的其中一個的多載採用做為參數。Pass the to one of the overloads of that takes as a parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks LINQ 到 XML 的載入功能會根據。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能會攔截所擲回任何例外狀況多載的方法和方法來讀取和剖析文件。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下列範例會建立文件從。The following example creates a document from a . ```csharp TextReader tr = new StringReader("Content"); XDocument doc = XDocument.Load(tr); Console.WriteLine(doc); ``` ```vb Dim tr As TextReader = New StringReader("Content") Dim doc As XDocument = XDocument.Load(tr) Console.WriteLine(doc) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml Content ```

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會使用基礎讀入 XML 樹狀結構中的 XML。This method uses an underlying to read the XML into an XML tree. 使用來建立從包含 XML 的字串。Use to create an from a string that contains XML. LINQ 到 XML 的載入功能會根據。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能會攔截所擲回任何例外狀況多載的方法和方法來讀取和剖析文件。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何載入從檔案。The following example shows how to load an from a file. 此範例使用下列 XML 文件：This example uses the following XML document: [範例 XML 檔：典型採購訂單 (LINQ to XML)Sample XML File: Typical Purchase Order (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0606c09f-6e43-4f8d-95c8-e8e2e08d2348) ```csharp XDocument doc = XDocument.Load("PurchaseOrder.xml"); Console.WriteLine(doc); ``` ```vb Dim doc As XDocument = XDocument.Load("PurchaseOrder.xml") Console.WriteLine(doc) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```
Ellen Adams 123 Maple Street Mill Valley CA 10999 USA
Tai Yee 8 Oak Avenue Old Town PA 95819 USA
Please leave packages in shed by driveway. Lawnmower 1 148.95 Confirm this is electric Baby Monitor 2 39.98 1999-05-21 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks LINQ to XML 的載入功能會根據。The loading functionality of LINQ to XML is built upon . 因此，您可能會攔截所擲回任何例外狀況多載的方法和方法來讀取和剖析文件。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. 如果您需要修改，請遵循下列步驟：If you have to modify , follow these steps: 1. 建立藉由呼叫其中一個多載做為參數。Create an by calling one of the overloads that takes as a parameter. 2. 傳遞的其中一個的多載採用做為參數。Pass the to one of the overloads of that takes as a parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果來源的 XML 縮排，則設定加上旗標在`options`造成讀取器讀取來源 XML 中的所有泛空白字元。If the source XML is indented, setting the flag in `options` causes the reader to read all white space in the source XML. 類型的節點會針對顯著與不顯著泛空白字元。Nodes of type are created for both significant and insignificant white space. 如果來源 XML 縮排，則未設定加上旗標在`options`會導致要忽略所有來源 XML 中不顯著泛空白字元的讀取器。If the source XML is indented, not setting the flag in `options` causes the reader to ignore all of the insignificant white space in the source XML. 沒有任何文字節點，如不顯著泛空白字元，會建立 XML 樹狀結構。The XML tree is created without any text nodes for insignificant white space. 如果來源 XML 不會縮排，則設定加上旗標在`options`沒有任何作用。If the source XML is not indented, setting the flag in `options` has no effect. 顯著泛空白字元仍會保留下來，並沒有有效的空白字元會導致更多的泛空白字元文字節點建立的合併。Significant white space is still preserved, and there are no spans of insignificant white space that could cause the creation of more white space text nodes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)並[保留泛空白字元序列化時](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). 使用來建立從包含 XML 的字串。Use to create an from a string that contains XML. 設定無效，從載入時。Setting is not valid when loading from a . 如果您將會對效能帶來負面影響旗標。There is a performance penalty if you set the flag. 程式行資訊正確無誤之後立即載入 XML 文件。The line information is accurate immediately after loading the XML document. 如果您修改 XML 樹狀結構之後載入文件時，則可能無意義的行資訊。If you modify the XML tree after loading the document, the line information may become meaningless. LINQ 到 XML 的載入功能會根據。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能會攔截所擲回任何例外狀況多載的方法和方法來讀取和剖析文件。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下列範例會建立文件從。The following example creates a document from a . ```csharp TextReader sr; int whiteSpaceNodes; sr = new StringReader(" "); XDocument xmlTree1 = XDocument.Load(sr, LoadOptions.None); sr.Close(); whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree1 .Element("Root") .DescendantNodesAndSelf() .OfType() .Where(tNode => tNode.ToString().Trim().Length == 0) .Count(); Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes); sr = new StringReader(" "); XDocument xmlTree2 = XDocument.Load(sr, LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace); sr.Close(); whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree2 .Element("Root") .DescendantNodesAndSelf() .OfType() .Where(tNode => tNode.ToString().Trim().Length == 0) .Count(); Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes); ``` ```vb Dim sr As TextReader Dim whiteSpaceNodes As Integer sr = New StringReader(" ") Dim xmlTree1 As XDocument = XDocument.Load(sr, LoadOptions.None) sr.Close() whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree1 _ .Element("Root") _ .DescendantNodesAndSelf() _ .OfType(Of XText)() _ .Where(Function(ByVal tNode As XNode) tNode. _ ToString().Trim().Length = 0).Count() Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes) sr = New StringReader(" ") Dim xmlTree2 As XDocument = XDocument.Load(sr, LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace) sr.Close() whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree2 _ .Element("Root") _ .DescendantNodesAndSelf() _ .OfType(Of XText)() _ .Where(Function(ByVal tNode As XNode) tNode. _ ToString().Trim().Length = 0).Count() Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): 0 Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): 3 ```

LINQ 到 XML 的載入功能會根據。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能會攔截所擲回任何例外狀況多載的方法和方法來讀取和剖析文件。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何載入從檔案。The following example shows how to load an from a file. 此範例使用下列 XML 文件：This example uses the following XML document: [範例 XML 檔：典型採購訂單 (LINQ to XML)Sample XML File: Typical Purchase Order (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0606c09f-6e43-4f8d-95c8-e8e2e08d2348) ```csharp XDocument doc1 = XDocument.Load("PurchaseOrder.xml", LoadOptions.None); Console.WriteLine("nodes if not preserving whitespace: {0}", doc1.DescendantNodes().Count()); XDocument doc2 = XDocument.Load("PurchaseOrder.xml", LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace); Console.WriteLine("nodes if preserving whitespace: {0}", doc2.DescendantNodes().Count()); ``` ```vb Dim doc1 As XDocument = XDocument.Load("PurchaseOrder.xml", LoadOptions.None) Console.WriteLine("nodes if not preserving whitespace: {0}", doc1.DescendantNodes().Count()) Dim doc2 As XDocument = XDocument.Load("PurchaseOrder.xml", LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace) Console.WriteLine("nodes if preserving whitespace: {0}", doc2.DescendantNodes().Count()) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` nodes if not preserving whitespace: 48 nodes if preserving whitespace: 82 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 藉由建立從 DOM 文件，接著再使用建立，這個方法可用來建立 LINQ to XML 樹狀結構中的 DOM 文件的複本。By creating an from a DOM document, and then using the to create an , this method can be used to create a copy of a DOM document in a LINQ to XML tree. 使用來建立從包含 XML 的字串。Use to create an from a string that contains XML. 設定無效，從載入時。Setting is not valid when loading from a . 或不會設定為其中一個讀取的空白字元。The will be configured to either read whitespace or not. LINQ to XML 樹狀結構會填入泛空白字元節點的讀取器介面。The LINQ to XML tree will be populated with the whitespace nodes that the reader surfaces. 這是不論是否行為或未設定。This will be the behavior regardless of whether is set or not. 或不可能有有效的基底 URI。The may have a valid base URI or not. 如果您設定，將 XML 樹狀結構中設定 URI，從所報告的基底 URI 的基底。If you set , the base URI will be set in the XML tree from the base URI that is reported by the . 或不可能有有效的行資訊。The may have a valid line information or not. 如果您設定，會由所報告的行資訊從 XML 樹狀結構中設定行資訊。If you set , the line information will be set in the XML tree from the line information that is reported by the . 如果您將會對效能帶來負面影響旗標。There is a performance penalty if you set the flag. 程式行資訊正確無誤之後立即載入 XML 文件。The line information is accurate immediately after loading the XML document. 如果您修改 XML 樹狀結構之後載入文件時，則可能無意義的行資訊。If you modify the XML tree after loading the document, the line information may become meaningless. LINQ 到 XML 的載入功能會根據。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能會攔截所擲回任何例外狀況多載的方法和方法來讀取和剖析文件。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下列範例會載入它會從載入的行資訊。The following example loads the line information that it loads from the . 接著，它會列印行資訊。It then prints the line information. ```csharp string markup = @" "; // Create a reader and move to the content. using (XmlReader nodeReader = XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(markup))) { // the reader must be in the Interactive state in order to // Create a LINQ to XML tree from it. nodeReader.MoveToContent(); XDocument xRoot = XDocument.Load(nodeReader, LoadOptions.SetLineInfo); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "Element Name".PadRight(20), "Line".PadRight(5), "Position"); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "------------".PadRight(20), "----".PadRight(5), "--------"); foreach (XElement e in xRoot.Elements("Root").DescendantsAndSelf()) Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) + e.Name).PadRight(20), ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5), ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LinePosition); } ``` ```vb Dim markup As String = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ "" ' Create a reader and move to the content. Using nodeReader As XmlReader = XmlReader.Create(New StringReader(markup)) ' The reader must be in the Interactive state in order to ' create a LINQ to XML tree from it. nodeReader.MoveToContent() Dim xRoot As XDocument = XDocument.Load(nodeReader, LoadOptions.SetLineInfo) Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "Element Name".PadRight(20), _ "Line".PadRight(5), _ "Position") Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "------------".PadRight(20), _ "----".PadRight(5), _ "--------") For Each e As XElement In xRoot.Elements("Root").DescendantsAndSelf() Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) & e.Name.ToString()).PadRight(20), _ (DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo)).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5), _ (DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo)).LinePosition) Next End Using ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Element Name Line Position ------------ ---- -------- Root 1 2 Child 2 6 GrandChild 3 10 ```

XDocument xmlTree = new XDocument( new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "yes"), new XElement("Root", "content") ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree.NodeType); ``` ```vb ' Note that this property uses XmlNodeType, which is in the System.Xml namespace. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會保留泛空白字元。This method does not preserve white space. 如果您想要保留 XML 樹狀結構中的泛空白字元，使用的多載採用做為參數。If you want to preserve white space in the XML tree, use the overload of that takes as a parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)並[保留泛空白字元序列化時](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). LINQ 到 XML 的載入功能會根據。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能會攔截所擲回任何例外狀況多載的方法和方法來讀取和剖析文件。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含 XML 的字串。The following example creates a string that contains XML. 然後它會剖析字串。It then parses the string into an . ```csharp string str = @" Content "; XDocument doc = XDocument.Parse(str); Console.WriteLine(doc); ``` ```vb Dim str As String = _ "" & _ "" & _ "" & _ " Content" & _ "" Dim doc As XDocument = XDocument.Parse(str) Console.WriteLine(doc) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml Content ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果來源的 XML 縮排，則設定加上旗標在`options`造成讀取器讀取來源 XML 中的所有泛空白字元。If the source XML is indented, setting the flag in `options` causes the reader to read all white space in the source XML. 類型的節點會針對顯著與不顯著泛空白字元。Nodes of type are created for both significant and insignificant white space. 如果來源 XML 縮排，則未設定加上旗標在`options`會導致要忽略所有來源 XML 中不顯著泛空白字元的讀取器。If the source XML is indented, not setting the flag in `options` causes the reader to ignore all of the insignificant white space in the source XML. 沒有任何文字節點，如不顯著泛空白字元，會建立 XML 樹狀結構。The XML tree is created without any text nodes for insignificant white space. 如果來源 XML 不會縮排，則設定加上旗標在`options`沒有任何作用。If the source XML is not indented, setting the flag in `options` has no effect. 顯著泛空白字元仍會保留下來，並沒有有效的空白字元會導致更多的泛空白字元文字節點建立的合併。Significant white space is still preserved, and there are no spans of insignificant white space that could cause the creation of more white space text nodes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)並[保留泛空白字元序列化時](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). 設定無效，無法剖析從時。Setting is not valid when parsing from a . 如果您將會對效能帶來負面影響旗標。There is a performance penalty if you set the flag. 程式行資訊正確無誤之後立即載入 XML 文件。The line information is accurate immediately after loading the XML document. 如果您修改 XML 樹狀結構之後載入文件時，則可能無意義的行資訊。If you modify the XML tree after loading the document, the line information may become meaningless. LINQ 到 XML 的載入功能會根據。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能會攔截所擲回任何例外狀況多載的方法和方法來讀取和剖析文件。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下列範例將字串剖析成。The following example parses a string into an . ```csharp string str = @" Content "; XDocument doc1 = XDocument.Parse(str, LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace); Console.WriteLine("nodes when preserving whitespace: {0}", doc1.DescendantNodes().Count()); XDocument doc2 = XDocument.Parse(str, LoadOptions.None); Console.WriteLine("nodes when not preserving whitespace: {0}", doc2.DescendantNodes().Count()); ``` ```vb Dim str As String = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ " Content" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim doc1 As XDocument = XDocument.Parse(str, LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace) Console.WriteLine("nodes when preserving whitespace: {0}", doc1.DescendantNodes().Count()) Dim doc2 As XDocument = XDocument.Parse(str, LoadOptions.None) Console.WriteLine("nodes when not preserving whitespace: {0}", doc2.DescendantNodes().Count()) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` nodes when preserving whitespace: 8 nodes when not preserving whitespace: 4 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性相當實用，當您想要撰寫[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]中相同之內容時加以組合樹狀結構為基礎的查詢。This property is useful when you want to compose [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] queries in the same context as when composing them for a tree rooted in . 請參閱[查詢 XDocument 與。查詢 XElement](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d266f58d-f2f3-4668-b661-e716e658d13a)如需詳細資訊。See [Querying an XDocument vs. Querying an XElement](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d266f58d-f2f3-4668-b661-e716e658d13a) for more details. ## Examples 下列範例會使用這個屬性，以取得文件的根項目。The following example uses this property to get the root element of a document. ```csharp XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment."), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); Console.WriteLine(doc.Root.Name.ToString()); ``` ```vb Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar Console.WriteLine(doc.Root.Name.ToString()) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Pubs ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將縮排序列化的 XML。The serialized XML will be indented. 將移除所有無意義的空格，並將會加入額外的空白字元，如此會適當地縮排的 XML。All insignificant white space will be removed, and additional white space will be added so that the XML will be properly indented. 這個方法的行為是將不會保留不顯著泛空白字元。The behavior of this method is that insignificant white space will not be preserved. 如果您想要控制空白字元時，使用的多載採用做為參數。If you want to control white space, use the overload of that takes as a parameter. 使用將未縮排的 XML 儲存選項。Use the option to save unindented XML. 這會導致要寫入所有泛空白字元的空白字元，XML 樹狀結構中所示的寫入器。This will cause the writer to write all white spaces exactly as represented in the XML tree. 使用選項，如果您想要移除重複的命名空間宣告。Use option if you want to remove duplicate namespace declarations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將縮排序列化的 XML。The serialized XML will be indented. 將移除所有無意義的空格，並將會加入額外的空白字元，如此會適當地縮排的 XML。All insignificant white space will be removed, and additional white space will be added so that the XML will be properly indented. 這個方法的行為是將不會保留不顯著泛空白字元。The behavior of this method is that insignificant white space will not be preserved. 如果您想要控制空白字元時，使用的多載採用做為參數。If you want to control white space, use the overload of that takes as a parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)並[保留泛空白字元序列化時](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). ## Examples 下列範例會建立，儲存至文件，然後列印至主控台的字串。The following example creates an , saves the document to a , and then prints the string to the console. ```csharp StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(); XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", "content") ) ); TextWriter tr = new StringWriter(sb); doc.Save(tr); Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString()); ``` ```vb Dim sb As StringBuilder = New StringBuilder() Dim doc As XDocument = _ content Dim tr As TextWriter = New StringWriter(sb) doc.Save(tr) Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString()) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml content ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 依預設`options`設定為。By default the `options` are set to . 這個選項會移除所有多餘的不顯著泛空白字元，並新增適當的不顯著泛空白字元，以便適當地縮排的 XML。This option will remove all extraneous insignificant white space, and add appropriate insignificant white space so that the XML is properly indented. 如果您想要儲存不縮排的 XML，指定旗標，以`options`。If you want to save unindented XML, specify the flag for `options`. 這會導致要寫入所有泛空白字元的空白字元，XML 樹狀結構中所示的寫入器。This will cause the writer to write all white spaces exactly as represented in the XML tree. 使用選項，如果您想要移除重複的命名空間宣告。Use option if you want to remove duplicate namespace declarations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要儲存不縮排的 XML，指定旗標，以`options`。If you want to save unindented XML, specify the flag for `options`. 這會導致要寫入所有泛空白字元的空白字元，XML 樹狀結構中所示的寫入器。This will cause the writer to write all white space exactly as represented in the XML tree. 如果您想要儲存縮排的 XML，未指定旗標，以`options`。If you want to save indented XML, do not specify the flag for `options`. 這會移除所有多餘的不顯著泛空白字元，並新增適當的不顯著泛空白字元，以便適當地縮排的 XML。This will remove all extraneous insignificant white space, and add appropriate insignificant white space so that the XML is properly indented. 這是預設行為，以及多載的行為方法不接受`options`做為參數。This is the default behavior, and the behavior of the overloads of the methods that do not take `options` as a parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)並[保留泛空白字元序列化時](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). ## Examples 下列範例會示範這個方法的兩種用途。The following example shows two uses of this method. 第一次使用序列化進行格式化。The first use serializes the with formatting. 第二個保留泛空白字元。The second preserves white space. 因為文件不有任何泛空白字元所建構，保留泛空白字元輸出沒有任何縮排的 XML。Because the document has no white space in it as constructed, preserving white space outputs the XML without any indenting. ```csharp XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", "content") ) ); StringBuilder sb1 = new StringBuilder(); using (StringWriter sr1 = new StringWriter(sb1)) { doc.Save(sr1, SaveOptions.None); Console.WriteLine(sb1.ToString()); } StringBuilder sb2 = new StringBuilder(); using (StringWriter sr2 = new StringWriter(sb2)) { doc.Save(sr2, SaveOptions.DisableFormatting); Console.WriteLine(sb2.ToString()); } ``` ```vb Dim doc As XDocument = _ content Dim sb1 As StringBuilder = New StringBuilder() Using sr1 = New StringWriter(sb1) doc.Save(sr1, SaveOptions.None) Console.WriteLine(sb1.ToString()) End Using Dim sb2 As StringBuilder = New StringBuilder() Using sr2 = New StringWriter(sb2) doc.Save(sr2, SaveOptions.DisableFormatting) Console.WriteLine(sb2.ToString()) End Using ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` content content ```
